name: Anantam
greetingText: Ha late lateef dar vakhat ni jem!
wishText: May the data flow seamlessly in your path, and may your insights shape the future ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
